name: samurai-dash
description:
if you are playing the web version, there is a bug that the move does not register when the mouse gets out of the game window

you are a samurai in a city that's being sucked by a black hole, as any good samurai, you have the ability to dash through the air to try to survive

but beware, since everything is being sucked out of existence you'll find enemies and obstacles in your path, you can slice through enemies with precise usage of your sword, but you can't slice through rocks

how to play:

  1. drag your finger through the phone screen to dash
  2. your dash has a significant cooldown, represented by a bar on top of the player, but there's no delay if you slice through an enemy
  3. getting hit by rocks or enemies knocks you you closer to the black hole
  4. if you touch the play hole, its game over
